path: artifacts/Bruno Inu Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

findings.title: Owner Privileges: Enable Cooldown
findings.description: Owner can enable cooldown (user to user trading restriction)

findings.title: Owner Privileges: Change Maximum Transaction Amount
findings.description: Owner can change the maximum transaction amount

findings.title: Owner Privileges: Add/Remove Bots
findings.description: Owner can add and remove bots (no transferring between addresses)

findings.title: Fee Address Withdrawal
findings.description: Fee address can withdraw half of the contract balance to fee address another half to marketing address

findings.title: Contract Exclusion from Reward Logic
findings.description: Contract has exclusion from reward logic but does not have functions to exclude
